page.title: 01A DESCRIPTION OF OUR AREA
page.content: Raunds is a small market town in East Nortants. It has a population of about 6000 people. There are many farms in Raunds. The farms have a few animals like pigs, cows and sheep. Some of the fields are used for crops. The rest are used for cattle. The farmers keep hay and straw in dutch barns. Some farms have orchards but there are not many in Raunds. In Autumn the farmers collect crops in during harvest time. Raunds is known for its leather and shoemaking. Raunds is also known for its large plastics factory. There are quite a few shops in Raunds. Most sell food and a few sell toys and clothes. We have two banks, two building societies and a Post Office. The shops close for half a day on Wednesday afternoon. We have a market in The Square every Friday.
